Function template for_each_n

boost::compute::for_each_n

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/compute/algorithm/for_each_n.hpp>


template<typename InputIterator, typename Size, typename UnaryFunction> 
  UnaryFunction 
  for_each_n(InputIterator first, Size count, UnaryFunction function, 
             command_queue & queue = system::default_queue());

Description

Calls function on each element in the range [first, first + count).

Space complexity: \Omega(1)

See Also:

for_each()
